climbs.name: Laffy Taffy
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Dave Cox, Gina Barerra, Richard Barerras, Frances, Pete

content.description: This climb ascends right up the middle of the largest formation of rock on the area.  Mostly a crack climb, but there is one bolt near the top to protect a face move.
content.protection: Trad gear, one quick draw for one bolt, and trad gear for the anchor. There is a walk off.
content.location: Head west off of Linn Rd. in Johnson Valley for a mile or two until you can see rocks on the left. Park, and walk over to the biggest formation. This is where you will find the Laffy Taffy.

climbs.name: The Devil's Bacon
climbs.fa: (TR) Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech  FA (Lead) Jeremy Schoenborn

content.description: This mini-climb goes up a striking and impressive arete, past 3 bolts, to a bolted anchor.
content.protection: Quick Draws only.  Three bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.location: This route is located off of Linn Rd. in Landers/Johnson Valley Area, before you get to Ghost Rock coming from Yucca.
